name: SecureEnclave.P256
desc: An elliptic curve that enables NIST P-256 signatures and key agreement within the Secure Enclave.

items.name: enum SecureEnclave.P256.KeyAgreement
items.desc: A mechanism used to create a shared secret between two users by performing NIST P-256 elliptic curve Diffie Hellman (ECDH) key exchange within the Secure Enclave.

items.name: enum SecureEnclave.P256.Signing
items.desc: A mechanism used to create or verify a cryptographic signature using the NIST P-256 elliptic curve digital signature algorithm (ECDSA) within the Secure Enclave.
